content: Hi Cargo team! The 2021 annual survey is almost ready: https://github.com/rust-lang/surveys/blob/main/surveys/2021-annual-survey/questions.md This year we have changed things a lot more from previous years than has been done in the past, so we'd really like people from the teams to give some feedback. Please take a look and either file issues or leave comments here. Further, if anyone from the cargo team could attend a video meeting with Ryan and I in the next week or so, that would be very useful. Please let me know if you're able to do that.
Hey Nick! I'll try to scan over the survey (it is quite large). I don't personally have anything to add, but I'm happy to attend a video chat.
